   1: `ifndef BSG_NOC_PKG_V
   2: `define BSG_NOC_PKG_V
   3: 
   4: // direction type
   5: package bsg_noc_pkg;
   6:   // Explictly sizing enum values (P=3'd0, not P=0) is necessary per Verilator 4.015
   7:   // https://www.veripool.org/issues/1442-Verilator-Enum-values-without-explicit-widths-are-considered-unsized
   8:   typedef enum logic[2:0] {P=3'd0, W, E, N, S} Dirs;
   9: endpackage
